entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
